posts.title: You work at Bank of America - missed connections
posts.body: As a teller and you are so fine. I had to visit today to see you. You are so handsome; and unfortunately I don't know your name. I keep meaning to look at your name tag but you make me nervous. And I usually don't get nervous around men. You're that cute :) I've been meaning to ask you out but I think that situation would be a little awkward since everyone around us could hear our convo. Tell me how much I withdrew and your name please if you see this. OR if anyone else sees this and knows his name - I'm sure anyone would know who I'm talking about if you go to that BOA - please let me know! Here's to trying!

posts.title: Blonde headed lady at grocery store. - missed connections
posts.body: We chatted and you actually ask me if I liked your yoga pants. I said no I love them. So if you see this message me.

posts.title: Great Clips - missed connections
posts.body: To the sexy lady at the FV Great Clips on Thursday morningYou were wearing a red blouse and black pantsjust wanted to see if we can meet again
